text: Konnifel - A Structured Research Ecosystem.  A dedicated platform connecting professors, researchers, universities and students around the world for the purpose of research internships, dissertations, fellowships, workshops and conferences at post graduate and doctoral research positions. Konnifel enables eminent and accomplished professors & universities publish their research projects and recruit students and aspiring researchers as interns, assistants and fellows to work on the same. The Platform provides a standardised candidate selection system for the benefit of research and academia, based on a Research Readiness & Aptitude Standard.
